title: Looking for a decent team
body:
hey boys/girls. i'm looking for someone that plays a role in Jungle and ADC mains and possibly Mid lane (Bronze 4-5). I and some friends play some customs games for some warm-ups sometimes play norms all day. If you want to play ranked as a team we can or just do some solo's if wanted.

If you are interested add/msg me on my account. 

Yours sincerely
Autistic Cancer (OCE)
{{champion:157}}

replies.body: jg main can play supp if u want on my other account tho or mid if needed add me
I can do you're adc. Add me juskillmealredy.
